translated: Tristan Tzara (born in 1896, died in 1963) is a Romanian writer and essayist, a founder of the Dada movement after which he became the leader.
original: Tristan Tzara (né en 1896, mort en 1963) est un écrivain et essayiste roumain, un des fondateurs du mouvement Dada dont il deviendra après le chef de file.
